medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message by identifying the message by a document number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the document date.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which relates to the whole message such as, the job number of a related inspection report.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate the location of the vessel during the inspection.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or supplementary information relevant to the entire message such as a letter of protest.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to identify the inspection company and any related parties pertaining to the whole message, their contacts and communication channel information. If more than one party is associated with the cargo, they are to be identified at the detail level.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify the name of the inspection company and any related parties pertaining to the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to specify the address of the identified parties.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers related to the identified party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify contacts and related communication numbers of the identified parties.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to specify a time log, detailing such information as, docked date and time, notice of readiness date and time, and reasons for excess transportation time.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing date and time information related to the voyage.

medi:segment.name: Status
medi:segment.medi:documentation: STS, A segment providing status event details related to the voyage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, A segment to specify free form or supplementary information pertaining to the status event and time.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify the cargo and the associated contractual quantity.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LIN, A segment to identify the cargo.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the contractual quantity for the identified cargo.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or supplementary information pertaining to the cargo.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify parties, contacts, and communication numbers related to the cargo.

medi:segment.name: Party identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PNA, A segment to identify the name of parties related to the cargo.

medi:segment.name: Address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ADR, A segment to specify the address of the identified parties.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers related to the identified party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to identify contacts and related communication numbers of the identified parties.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to provide details of the transport vessel and the bulk cargo.

medi:segment.name: Transport information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to specify transport details such as vessel name, voyage number, and carrier as it relates to a stage of transport.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify the type of equipment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify reference numbers for the lighter vessel identification and its voyage number.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of cargo owned by related party.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements related to the vessel such as draft markings.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to specify non-discrete measurement values related to the vessel such as list.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to identify test methods and their results related to the cargo.

medi:segment.name: Physical sample description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PSD, A segment to provide specimen collection details.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate the location from which the sample being tested was taken.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to identify test methods and their results related to the cargo.

medi:segment.name: Test method
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TEM, A segment to identify a test method.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the results of the test.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to specify the results of the test expressed in percentages.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify dates and times associated with the test.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or supplementary information pertaining to the test.
